credit_line: Selection from the Peterson Collection, Gift of William Bingham II
title:
Album of twelve paintings
1.  Two scholars examining a drawing of bamboo leaves
2.  Cherry trees enveloped by mist
3.  A woman on a terrace with bananas bathing her baby boy
4.  A cottage in the hills
5.  A fisherman clad in a blue coat resting in hi
description: embroided cover of red with yellow, white, pink, blue and green designs. Said to be by Tang Yin, but probably  not. There is a date written on it which is probably incorrect.
inscriptions: end page stamped ink red: [seven artist's seals]; end page u.r. in ink: 463/ 219. Front sheet says that it is in the style of great masters.
